results.definition: the act of making up your mind about something
examples: the burden of decision was his

results.definition: a position or opinion or judgment reached after consideration
examples: a decision unfavorable to the opposition

results.definition: the trait of resoluteness as evidenced by firmness of character or purpose
(boxing) a victory won on points when no knockout has occurred
examples: had little trouble in taking a unanimous decision over his opponent

results.definition: the outcome of a game or contest
examples: the team dropped three decisions in a row
